channel.title: How To Make A Server! Better Then The Sticky!
channel.description:
Updated: 22/12/11 Sorry Pictures need reuploading.
[b]INFO PLEASE READ BEFORE BEGINING.[/b] If you download the new version of JDK(7) and compile, it will mess up your source so please use JDK 6.
Hi,
Today I was bored so now I'm making a tutorial on how to make a Server! If anyone is going to lock it, please read through the whole thing then decide to lock it or not because this takes a long time to write and I think this is better than the stickied one!
[b]Step 1 - Downloading WinRAR[/b]
For your server, it is essential to Download WinRAR because you will be extracting files later on in this tutorial. You can download WinRAR [url=http://download.cnet.com/3001-2250_4-10007677.html?spi=3575e460e6125c1834cdec48b8eeae91]Here[/url]! If you already have WinRAR Then go onto Step 2.
[b]Step 2 - Downloading And Installing Java[/b]
For your server it is essential to have JDK (Java Developers Kit). You will need this to compile and maybe other stuff in the future. You can download JDK from [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javaee/downloads/java-ee-6u2-wjdk-6u26-409231.html]Here[/url]! After doing this step, go onto Step 3. If you have already got JDK Automatically go onto Step 3. The page you come to should look like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/jdk.PNG[/img]
Now you should accept the licence Agreement and choose your Operating System/Platform.
If you are using Google Chrome, After doing that you should see something like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/dl.PNG[/img]
[b]Step 3 - Setting Up No-Ip[/b]
No-Ip is a free service which you will need to keep your server online. What No-Ip does is it creates an Ip for you so anyone that wants to play your server can play your server from anywhere.
First, You will have to head [url=http://www.no-ip.com]Here[/url]! After the page loads, It should look like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/noip.PNG[/img]
Now that you are on www.no-ip.com, You should now click on download then you should click on your operating system. It should look like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/downloadnoip.PNG[/img]
Ok, Now that you have downloaded it, login in to the software you just downloaded. Now minimize it. Now go to www.No-Ip.com Login to your No-Ip account. After logging in, you should come to a page like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/startpage.PNG[/img] Click on Hosts/Redirects, Now click on Add A Host. After Clicking Those, you should come to a page like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/addinghost.PNG[/img] After entering the host name click create host!
Finally you have made your host, Now open Duc 3.0 (The program you installed from www.no-ip.com) Click Select Hosts and select your host you made just a few minutes ago. It should look like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/selecting.PNG[/img]
If you have done everything right, It should look like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/check.PNG[/img]
If it's all checked, then go onto the next step!
[b]Step 4 - Setting Your Environmental Variables[/b]
Go to Start > Computer > C: > Program Files (x86) > Java > jre6 > bin
Now right click on the address bar and choose copy address as text.
Now Go to "Start", right click on "Computer" and selection "Properties". Then select the "Advanced system settings" link on the left column of that window. Click the "Environment Variables" button. Click on Path. Now click on Edit. Replace the whole thing with: [code]%systemroot%\system32;%systemroot%;%systemroot%\system32\wbem;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin[/code] Now click on OK on all the windows to close them.
Congratulations, You have now set your Environmental Variables!
Step 5 - Downloading A Client And A Source
To start off, You will need to download a client and a source. You can download a source and client from the download's section. You can access the download's section by clicking [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html]Here[/url]!
After Downloading it, you will have to extract it. You can extract it by using WinRAR.
Step 6 - Portforwarding
Some people have lots of problems Portforwarding, so im going to show you how to do Portforwarding on Bt. I can not show you how to do it on a different router because I only have Bt Home Hub.
First open up cmd and type in "ipconfig" It should look like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/ipconfig.PNG[/img]
Copy the right address and go to your browser and paste it in the address bar and hit go! After doing that you should come to a page like this: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/p1.PNG[/img]
Click Settings then enter your password then click ok, After that click advanced settings then click continue to advanced settings. Now click broadband then click Dynamic DNS. Fill it out how I did it: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/dynamic.PNG[/img]
Now click Portforwarding then supported applications then click add new game or application and do what I do: [img]http://playusnow.x10.mx/forwarding.PNG[/img]
Done, This took me over 2 Hours, So don't flame if you think this is a bad tutorial.
[s]Rep++ Would be appreciated.[/s]
Credits Hrach (Me)

item.title: How To Make A Server! Better Then The Sticky!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

How is this how to make PI? If you want delta, pi, or whatever, you do it wih a source. This is how to start a server.
As always, this is a thousand times better than the stickied guide, but we already have too many and this is unneeded. Also, don’t ask for an increase of a MySQL integer. It doesn’t do anything.

Read full topic

@hrach123 wrote:

Updated: 22/12/11
Sorry Pictures need reuploading.

INFO PLEASE READ BEFORE BEGINING.
If you download the new version of JDK(7) and compile, it will mess up your source so please use JDK 6.

Hi,

Today I was bored so now I’m making a tutorial on how to make a Server! If anyone is going to lock it, please read through the whole thing then decide to lock it or not because this takes a long time to write and I think this is better than the stickied one!

Step 1 - Downloading WinRAR

For your server, it is essential to Download WinRAR because you will be extracting files later on in this tutorial. You can download WinRAR Here! If you already have WinRAR Then go onto Step 2.

Step 2 - Downloading And Installing Java

For your server it is essential to have JDK (Java Developers Kit). You will need this to compile and maybe other stuff in the future. You can download JDK from Here! After doing this step, go onto Step 3. If you have already got JDK Automatically go onto Step 3.
The page you come to should look like this:

Now you should accept the licence Agreement and choose your Operating System/Platform.

If you are using Google Chrome, After doing that you should see something like this:

Step 3 - Setting Up No-Ip

No-Ip is a free service which you will need to keep your server online. What No-Ip does is it creates an Ip for you so anyone that wants to play your server can play your server from anywhere.

First, You will have to head Here!
After the page loads, It should look like this:

Now that you are on www.no-ip.com, You should now click on download then you should click on your operating system.
It should look like this:

Ok, Now that you have downloaded it, login in to the software you just downloaded. Now minimize it.
Now go to www.No-Ip.com
Login to your No-Ip account. After logging in, you should come to a page like this:

Click on Hosts/Redirects, Now click on Add A Host.
After Clicking Those, you should come to a page like this:

After entering the host name click create host!

Finally you have made your host, Now open Duc 3.0 (The program you installed from www.no-ip.com)
Click Select Hosts and select your host you made just a few minutes ago.
It should look like this:

If you have done everything right, It should look like this:

If it’s all checked, then go onto the next step!

Step 4 - Setting Your Environmental Variables

Go to Start > Computer > C: > Program Files (x86) > Java > jre6 > bin

Now right click on the address bar and choose copy address as text.

Now Go to “Start”, right click on “Computer” and selection “Properties”. Then select the “Advanced system settings” link on the left column of that window.
Click the “Environment Variables” button.
Click on Path.
Now click on Edit.
Replace the whole thing with:

Now click on OK on all the windows to close them.

Congratulations, You have now set your Environmental Variables!

Step 5 - Downloading A Client And A Source

To start off, You will need to download a client and a source. You can download a source and client from the download’s section. You can access the download’s section by clicking Here!

After Downloading it, you will have to extract it. You can extract it by using WinRAR.

Step 6 - Portforwarding

Some people have lots of problems Portforwarding, so im going to show you how to do Portforwarding on Bt.
I can not show you how to do it on a different router because I only have Bt Home Hub.

First open up cmd and type in “ipconfig”
It should look like this:

Copy the right address and go to your browser and paste it in the address bar and hit go!
After doing that you should come to a page like this:

Click Settings then enter your password then click ok, After that click advanced settings then click continue to advanced settings.
Now click broadband then click Dynamic DNS.
Fill it out how I did it:

Now click Portforwarding then supported applications then click add new game or application and do what I do:

Done, This took me over 2 Hours, So don’t flame if you think this is a bad tutorial.
